org.ff4j.audit.repository

Class InMemoryEventRepository

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.audit.repository.AbstractEventRepository
      • org.ff4j.audit.repository.InMemoryEventRepository
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    EventRepository

    public class InMemoryEventRepository
extends AbstractEventRepository
    Implementation of in memory EventRepository with limited events.
    Author:
    Cedrick Lunven (@clunven)
